There are more than ten airlines companies operating in Brindisi airport. Ryanair and AirBerlin have more frequent flights from major European cities, compare to others.  
AirBerlin travels from several major airports in Germany.
Oria station is served by Italian national railway. Practically Oria is well connected by local train with two major cities in Puglia, Brindisi and Taranto.
There is a direct night train from Roma Termini Station everyday. It costs €32.60, and takes 7 hours 45 minutes.
The train from Taranto departs to oria frequently. It cost €2.60 for 37 minutes travel.
Brindisi train station has daily schedule for the train departing to oria. Train costs €2.30.

Intercity and Fast train connect Brindisi and northern big cities.

Italian motorway doesn't go through in oria city, but the travellers should follow E90/SS7 motorway instead. E90/SS7 is the motorway which connects Brindisi and Taranto. The travellers should take the exit of oria, the distance from the exit to oria is roughly around 5km.
